entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as the one being spoken to by Lucius Malfoy. He seems scared of looking at Harry Potter.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as the one who sounds avid and excited about handing over Harry Potter to the Dark Lord.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is mentioned as a menacing character who seems to be involved in the capture of Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one being referred to by Lucius Malfoy and Greyback. He is described as being in a state of distress.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy speaks to Draco, asking him if they are the ones who caught Harry Potter.
Greyback is involved in the capture of Harry Potter, as mentioned by Lucius Malfoy.
Lucius Malfoy asks Greyback about how Harry Potter got into his current state.
